page.title: 01THE BEACON
page.content:
The Beacon Community Centre is for sport and leisure. You can take part in all these sports: football, badminton, squash, netball, basketball, rockclimbing, athletics trampolining and gymnastics.
In the holidays there are also five- a-side football matches which schools can take part in . From morning to night men and women can book sessions for badminton, squash, rockclimbing and weight-lifting.
There are also activites for old-age pensioners. They play bingo and cards or can just chat. For little children there is a playgroup where they can play on chutes and climbing frames.On Wednesdays and Saturdays we sometimes go there for the disco and canteen.
